page.title: 01GENERAL INFORMATION
page.content: The area we have covered includes Little Chalfont, part of Amersham Old Town,arable farming land, the Harewood Downs Golf Course and the privately owned Pollards Wood. The building is largely residential and the population professional with above-average educational qualifications. As housing is very expensive the proportion of retired and young married people is small. In a typical family the father commutes daily to London, the mother works as a teacher, nurse or secretary (if she works) and the children are of school age or above. Since access to London is very easy (by both Metropolitan tube and B.R. and the M40 and M25) and the countryside is green belt, the district is very popular. The educational system is considered good with transfer from middle schools as a result of the 12+ examination.
